findings.title: Reentrancy in MasterChef.setPoolStrategy(uint256,address)
findings.description: The setPoolStrategy function in MasterChef contract is susceptible to reentrancy attacks.

findings.title: Reentrancy in MasterChef.withdraw(uint256,uint256)
findings.description: The function withdraw(uint256,uint256) in MasterChef contract has a reentrancy vulnerability due to external calls and state variables written after these calls.

findings.title: Unused Return: MasterChef.safePudTransfer(address,uint256)
findings.description: The return value of MasterChef.safePudTransfer(address,uint256) is ignored.

findings.title: Reentrancy in MasterChef.emergencyWithdraw(uint256)
findings.description: The emergencyWithdraw function in MasterChef contract is vulnerable to reentrancy attacks due to external calls.

findings.title: Reentrancy in MasterChef.set(uint256,uint256,bool)
findings.description: The set function in MasterChef contract is vulnerable to reentrancy attacks due to external calls and state variables written after these calls.
